body_html:
tests are failing for your DataParallel change.
See 2.7: https://build.pytorch.org/job/pytorch-pull-requests-py2/606/console
See 3.5: https://build.pytorch.org/job/pytorch-pull-requests-py3/603/console

Same failure in all the tests:

Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "test_nn.py", line 995, in test_data_parallel
    out = dp.data_parallel(l, i, (0, 1))
  File "/home/jenkins/miniconda/envs/py2k/lib/python2.7/site-packages/torch/nn/parallel/data_parallel.py", line 104, in data_parallel
    replicas = replicate(module, device_ids[:len(inputs)])
  File "/home/jenkins/miniconda/envs/py2k/lib/python2.7/site-packages/torch/nn/parallel/replicate.py", line 19, in replicate
    buffer_copies = comm.broadcast_coalesced(buffers, devices)
  File "/home/jenkins/miniconda/envs/py2k/lib/python2.7/site-packages/torch/cuda/comm.py", line 56, in broadcast_coalesced
    for chunk in _take_tensors(tensors, buffer_size):
  File "/home/jenkins/miniconda/envs/py2k/lib/python2.7/site-packages/torch/cuda/comm.py", line 239, in _take_tensors
    last_type = type(tensors[0])
IndexError: list index out of range

body:
tests are failing for your DataParallel change.
See 2.7: https://build.pytorch.org/job/pytorch-pull-requests-py2/606/console
See 3.5: https://build.pytorch.org/job/pytorch-pull-requests-py3/603/console

Same failure in all the tests:
```
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "test_nn.py", line 995, in test_data_parallel
    out = dp.data_parallel(l, i, (0, 1))
  File "/home/jenkins/miniconda/envs/py2k/lib/python2.7/site-packages/torch/nn/parallel/data_parallel.py", line 104, in data_parallel
    replicas = replicate(module, device_ids[:len(inputs)])
  File "/home/jenkins/miniconda/envs/py2k/lib/python2.7/site-packages/torch/nn/parallel/replicate.py", line 19, in replicate
    buffer_copies = comm.broadcast_coalesced(buffers, devices)
  File "/home/jenkins/miniconda/envs/py2k/lib/python2.7/site-packages/torch/cuda/comm.py", line 56, in broadcast_coalesced
    for chunk in _take_tensors(tensors, buffer_size):
  File "/home/jenkins/miniconda/envs/py2k/lib/python2.7/site-packages/torch/cuda/comm.py", line 239, in _take_tensors
    last_type = type(tensors[0])
IndexError: list index out of range
```
